Description: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

Title: Here Comes the Boom
Description: A high-school biology teacher looks to become a successful mixed martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to prevent extracurricular activities from being axed at his cash-strapped school.

Title: The Sure Thing
Description: Walter Gibson is a university freshman going through a dry spell. His old buddy arranges a "sure thing" for him in California. Gibson and his classmate Allison then take a long road trip out to Cali, and both foil each other's plans.

Title: Caché
Description: A married couple is terrorized by a series of surveillance videotapes left on their front porch.

Title: Wuthering Heights
Description: A poor boy of unknown origins is rescued from poverty and taken in by the Earnshaw family where he develops an intense relationship with his young foster sister, Cathy.

Title: Dagon
Description: A boating accident runs a young man and woman ashore in a decrepit Spanish fishing town which they discover is in the grips of an ancient sea god and its monstrous half human offspring.

Title: Becoming Jane
Description: A biographical portrait of a pre-fame Jane Austen and her romance with a young Irishman.

Title: Enemy Mine
Description: During a long space war, the lives of two wounded enemies become dependent on their ability to forgive and to trust.

Title: Tulip Fever
Description: An artist falls for a young married woman while he's commissioned to paint her portrait during the Tulip mania of seventeenth century Amsterdam.

Title: Jonah Hex
Description: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

Title: No Reservations
Description: The life of a top chef changes when she becomes the guardian of her young niece.

Title: Harsh Times
Description: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

Title: Yume
Description: A collection of tales based upon eight of director Akira Kurosawa's recurring dreams.

Title: Three Identical Strangers
Description: In 1980 New York, three young men who were all adopted meet each other and find out they're triplets who were separated at birth. But their quest to find out why turns into a bizarre and sinister mystery.

Title: Premium Rush
Description: In Manhattan, a bike messenger picks up an envelope that attracts the interest of a dirty cop, who pursues the cyclist throughout the city.

Title: Wonder Boys
Description: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.

Title: Wonder Wheel
Description: On Coney Island in the 1950s, a lifeguard tells the story of a middle-aged carousel operator, his beleaguered wife and the visitor who turns their lives upside-down.

Title: Europa
Description: Just after W.W.II, an American takes a railway job in Germany, but finds his position politically sensitive with various people trying to use him.

Title: Troop Beverly Hills
Description: A soon to be divorced Beverly Hills socialite is determined to prove to her husband and herself that she can finish what she starts out to do, by becoming a den mother to a troop of Beverly Hills Girl Scouts.

Title: Untraceable
Description: FBI agent Jennifer Marsh is tasked with hunting down a seemingly untraceable serial killer who posts live videos of his victims on the Internet. As time runs out, the cat and mouse chase becomes more personal.

Title: Attenberg
Description: Stuck in her boring factory town, twenty-three-year-old Marina is at the mercy of both her father's impending death and her distaste for other humans.

Title: My Stepmother Is an Alien
Description: A creature from another planet tries to seduce a shy Earth physicist to gain control over his researches. The result of this important mission much exceeded her expectations.

Title: The Good Girl
Description: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.

Title: Pierrot le fou
Description: Pierrot escapes his boring society and travels from Paris to the Mediterranean Sea with Marianne, a girl chased by hit-men from Algeria. They lead an unorthodox life, always on the run.

Title: The Current War
Description: The dramatic story of the cutthroat race between electricity titans Thomas A. Edison and George Westinghouse to determine whose electrical system would power the modern world.

Title: Foreign Correspondent
Description: On the eve of World War II, a young American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London.

Title: Broken City
Description: In a city rife with injustice, ex-cop Billy Taggart seeks redemption and revenge after being double-crossed by its most powerful figure: Mayor Nicholas Hostetler.

Title: Shine
Description: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

Title: Exotica
Description: A man plagued by neuroses frequents the club Exotica in an attempt to find solace, but even there his past is never far away.

Title: The Baby-Sitters Club
Description: Seven junior-high-school girls organize a daycare camp for children while at the same time experiencing classic adolescent growing pains.

Title: Howl
Description: When passengers on a train are attacked by a creature, they must band together in order to survive until morning.

Title: The Young and Prodigious T.S. Spivet
Description: A ten-year-old scientist secretly leaves his family's ranch in Montana where he lives with his cowboy father and scientist mother, escapes home, and travels across the country aboard a freight train to receive an award at the Smithsonian Institute.

Title: Jabberwocky
Description: A young peasant with no interest in adventure or fortune is mistaken for the kingdom's only hope when a horrible monster threatens the countryside.

Title: Ophelia
Description: A reimagining of Hamlet, told from Ophelia's perspective.

Title: Passengers
Description: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

Title: The Merchant of Venice
Description: In 16th century Venice, when a merchant must default on a large loan from an abused Jewish moneylender for a friend with romantic ambitions, the bitterly vengeful creditor demands a gruesome payment instead.

Title: The Swan Princess
Description: A power-hungry sorcerer curses a princess to live as a swan by day in this tale of everlasting love.

Title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
Description: The Freeling family have a new house, but their troubles with supernatural forces don't seem to be over.

Title: Total Eclipse

Title: The Tall Man
Description: When her child goes missing, a mother looks to unravel the legend of the Tall Man, an entity who allegedly abducts children.

Title: Biutiful
Description: A man dying of cancer tries his best to leave the world on his own terms.

Title: Very Good Girls

Title: Gekijô-ban poketto monsutâ - Myûtsû no gyakushû
Description: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

Title: Anonymous
Description: The theory that it was in fact Edward De Vere, Earl of Oxford, who penned Shakespeare's plays. Set against the backdrop of the succession of Queen Elizabeth I and the Essex rebellion against her.

Title: Angela's Ashes
Description: Based on the best-selling autobiography by Irish expatriate Frank McCourt, Angela's Ashes follows the experiences of young Frankie and his family as they try against all odds to escape the ...                See full summary »

Title: Psycho III
Description: Norman Bates falls in love with a fallen nun who stays at the Bates Motel alongside a drifter and a curious reporter. Meanwhile, "Mother" is still watching.

Title: Madeline
Description: Horrified at the prospect of her beloved school being sold, a young French girl uses her wit and craftiness to attempt to save it, making an unlikely new friend in the process.

Title: Devdas
Description: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

Title: The Man from Snowy River
Description: In 1880s Australia, after young Jim Craig's father dies, he takes a job at the Harrison cattle ranch, where he is forced to become a man.

Title: Starter for 10
Description: Set in 1985, working-class student Brian Jackson (McAvoy) navigates his first year at Bristol University.

Title: En kongelig affære
Description: A young queen, who is married to an insane king, falls secretly in love with her physician - and together they start a revolution that changes a nation forever.

Title: Dark Water
Description: A mother and daughter, still wounded from a bitter custody dispute, hole up in a run-down apartment building, where they are targeted by the ghost of a former resident.

Title: Serena
Description: In Depression-era North Carolina, the future of George Pemberton's timber empire becomes complicated when he marries Serena.

Title: Rachel Getting Married
Description: A young woman who has been in and out of rehab for the past ten years, returns home for the weekend for her sister's wedding.

Description: Emma left Russia to live with her husband in Italy. Now a member of a powerful industrial family, she is the respected mother of three, but feels unfulfilled. One day, Antonio, a talented chef and her son's friend, makes her senses kindle.

Description: During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.

Title: Jin ling shi san chai
Description: An American finds refuge during the 1937 Japanese invasion of Nanking in a church with a group of women. Posing as a priest, he attempts to lead the women to safety.

Title: The Innocents
Description: A young governess for two children becomes convinced that the house and grounds are haunted.

Title: Black Water
Description: A terrifying tale of survival in the mangrove swamps of Northern Australia

Title: An American Werewolf in Paris
Description: An American man unwittingly gets involved with French werewolves who have developed a serum allowing them to transform at will.

Title: Sátántangó

Title: Ghost Story

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
Description: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may be able to defeat him for good.

Title: The Stepford Wives
Description: Joanna Eberhart has come to the quaint little town of Stepford, Connecticut with her family, but soon discovers there lies a sinister truth in the all too perfect behavior of the female residents.

Title: Autómata
Description: Human race is at edge of the end. Robot race is at edge of the beginning.

Title: The Station Agent
Description: When his only friend dies, a man born with dwarfism moves to rural New Jersey to live a life of solitude, only to meet a chatty hot dog vendor and a woman dealing with her own personal loss.

Title: Private Benjamin
Description: A sheltered young high-society woman joins the United States Army on a whim and finds herself in a trickier situation than she ever expected.

Title: La battaglia di Algeri
Description: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

Title: 24 Hour Party People

Title: The Zero Theorem

Title: You Can Count on Me

Title: The General
Description: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines.

Title: Anna and the King
Description: The story of the romance between the King of Siam and widowed British schoolteacher, Anna Leonowens, during the 1860s.

Title: Greedy
Description: Rich, old uncle Joe is surrounded by relatives waiting/hoping for him to die while trying to look good and backstabbing the competition. What should he do?

Title: The Brothers Bloom
Description: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

Title: Le scaphandre et le papillon
Description: The true story of Elle editor Jean-Dominique Bauby who suffers a stroke and has to live with an almost totally paralyzed body; only his left eye isn't paralyzed.

Title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India

Title: Yi yi

Title: Yi dai zong shi
Description: The story of martial-arts master Ip Man, the man who trained Bruce Lee.

Title: Highlander II: The Quickening

Title: The Survivalist

Title: Kaidan

Title: The Proposition

Title: The Man in the Moon

Title: Johnny Got His Gun

Title: The Sand Pebbles
Description: In 1926, a U.S. Naval engineer gets assigned to a gunboat on a rescue mission in war-torn China.

Title: Le salaire de la peur

Title: Summer Catch

Title: All I See Is You

Title: Le cercle rouge
Description: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

Title: Persepolis

Title: Deception

Title: Blindness

Title: Elizabethtown
Description: During a hometown memorial for his Kentucky-born father, a young man begins an unexpected romance with a too-good-to-be-true stewardess.

Title: Orlando

Title: First Kill
Description: A Wall Street broker is forced to evade a police chief investigating a bank robbery as he attempts to recover the stolen money in exchange for his son's life.

Title: Marmaduke

Title: Nostalgia

Title: Dragonfly
Description: A grieving doctor is being contacted by his deceased wife through his patients' near death experiences.

Title: Turks fruit
Description: A young love faces with old problems.

Title: Nabbeun namja
Description: An unfeeling gangster seeks to ruin the life of a young girl who rejected him. He forces her into prostitution and spies on her regularly, then he soon begins to fall for her.

Title: The Boys in the Band

Title: The Innkeepers

Title: Military Wives

Title: Un prophète

Title: Uncommon Valor
Description: Ten years after his son went M.I.A. in Vietnam, U.S. Marine retired Colonel Jason Rhodes assembles a private rescue team to find Americans held in P.O.W. camps in Laos.

Title: Le Mans

Title: The Hand

Title: Koroshi no rakuin
Description: After a botched assignment, a rice-fetishizing hitman finds himself in conflict with his organization, and one mysterious, dangerous fellow-hitman in particular.

Title: Noordzee, Texas

Title: Gilda
Description: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

Title: Senna

Title: Pollock
Description: A film about the life and career of the American painter, Jackson Pollock.

Title: Le Samouraï
Description: After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

Title: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters

Title: Gods and Monsters
Description: The last days of Frankenstein (1931) director James Whale are explored.

Title: Les choristes
Description: The new teacher at a severely administered boys' boarding school works to positively affect the students' lives through music.

Title: The Contract
Description: A father and his son attempt to bring in an assassin to the authorities, but his dangerous associates have other plans.

Title: Relic

Description: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.

Title: K.G.F: Chapter 1

Title: Two Lovers

Title: Young Adam

Title: The Comedian
Description: A look at the life of an aging insult comic named Jack Burke.

Title: Kakushi-toride no san-akunin
Description: Lured by gold, two greedy peasants unknowingly escort a princess and her general across enemy lines.

Title: Premonition

Description: The classic story of Robinson Crusoe, a man who is dragged to a desert island after a shipwreck.

Title: Radioactive
Description: The incredible true story of Marie Sklodowska-Curie and her Nobel Prize-winning work that changed the world.

Description: Lorenzo Odone, a Virginia 5-year-old, develops a degenerative nerve disease so rare that nobody is working on a cure, so his parents decide to immerse themselves in research and tackle the problem themselves.

Title: Hoffa

Title: Goal!
Description: The extremely talented Santiago Muñez is spotted by a Newcastle United scout and given a chance at professional football.

Title: Dream Horse

Title: Tequila Sunrise

Title: Nim's Island

Title: Arizona Dream
Description: A young New Yorker goes to Arizona where he finds freedom to both love and dream.

Title: L.A. Story
Description: With the help of a talking freeway billboard, a wacky weatherman tries to win the heart of an English newspaper reporter, who is struggling to make sense of the strange world of early 1990s Los Angeles.

Title: Irma Vep
Description: A Hong Kong actress, Maggie Cheung playing a fictional version of herself, is cast in France to star in a remake of Les vampires (1915), but petty intrigues and clashing egos plague the production.

Title: The Food of the Gods
Description: A group of friends travel to a remote Canadian island to hunt, only to be attacked by giant killer animals which have populated the place.

Title: The Condemned

He is "purchased" by a wealthy television producer and taken to a desolate island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers from all corners of the world, with freedom going to the sole survivor.

Title: The Thing Called Love
Description: A group of newcomers to the country music business seek love and stardom.

Title: The Painted Veil
Description: A British medical doctor fights a cholera epidemic in a small Chinese village, while being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.

Title: The Ice Pirates
Description: In a distant future scarce of water, space pirates get caught after stealing ice from a spaceship. They are sold to a princess looking for her dad. He might have found a planet abundant with water.

Title: The Tailor of Panama
Description: A tailor living in Panama reluctantly becomes a spy for a British Agent.

Title: The Last Sentinel
Description: No emotion. No fear. No pain. They were the perfect soldiers to protect mankind - until the drone police became the perfect enemy. Tallis, a cyber-enhanced soldier, rescues a rebel beauty and teach her to fight and think like a machine.

Title: Mortal
Description: Fantasy adventure origin story about a young man discovering he has god-like powers based on ancient Norse mythology.

Title: L'appartement
Description: A recently engaged man sees a former lover and becomes obsessed with meeting her again.

Title: O Fantasma
Description: Young and handsome Sergio works the night shift as a trash collector in Lisbon, Portugal. He can't force himself to connect with his pretty female co-worker Fatima, who displays an avid ...                See full summary »

Title: Rabbit-Proof Fence
Description: In 1931, three half-white, half-Aboriginal girls escape after being plucked from their houses to be trained as domestic staff, and set off on a journey across the Outback.

Title: Les parapluies de Cherbourg
Description: A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

Title: The Swimmer
Description: A man spends a summer day swimming as many pools as he can all over a quiet suburban town.

Title: The Grey Fox
Description: When an aging, but gentlemanly stagecoach robber is released from prison, he decides to go to Canada to become a train robber.

Title: Dip huet seung hung
Description: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded.

Title: Kokuhaku
Description: A psychological thriller of a grieving mother turned cold-blooded avenger with a twisty master plan to pay back those who were responsible for her daughter's death.

Title: Nicholas Nickleby
Description: A young, compassionate man struggles to save his family and friends from the abusive exploitation of his cold-heartedly grasping uncle.

Title: Miss Potter
Description: The story of Beatrix Potter, the author of the beloved and best-selling children's book, "The Tale of Peter Rabbit", and her struggle for love, happiness, and success.

Title: Black and Blue
Description: A rookie New Orleans police officer is forced to balance her identity as a black woman after she witnesses two corrupt cops committing murder.

Title: The Souvenir
Description: A young film student in the early '80s becomes romantically involved with a complicated and untrustworthy man.

Title: Dreamscape
Description: A man who can enter and manipulate people's dreams is recruited by a government agency to help cure the President of the United States of his nightmares about nuclear war but stumbles upon an assassination plot.

Title: Rock-A-Doodle
Description: In order to defeat the wicked Grand Duke of Owls, a young boy, transformed into a cat, teams up with a group of barnyard animals to find the rooster who can raise the sun.

Title: Miss Fisher and the Crypt of Tears

Title: The Riot Club

Title: Bang Gang (une histoire d'amour moderne)
Description: In the well-to-do suburbs of a small town, a group of pretty average, well-adjusted sixteen and seventeen year olds are ordinary adolescents who take a singular path.

Title: The Apple Dumpling Gang
Description: Three orphan children strike gold in 1878 California.

Title: Certain Women
Description: The lives of three women intersect in small-town America, where each is imperfectly blazing a trail.

Title: Get Carter
Description: A Las Vegas mob enforcer travels back to his hometown to investigate his brother's mysterious death.

Title: True Crime
Description: Can an over-the-hill journalist uncover the evidence that can prove a death row inmate's innocence just hours before his execution?

Title: Ying
Description: In a Chinese royal court, an army commander secretly trains a "shadow" to retake a city against the wishes of the king.

Title: Bad Samaritan
Description: A pair of burglars stumble upon a woman being held captive in a home they intended to rob.

Title: Forushande
Description: While Ranaa and Emad, a married couple, are participating in a production of "Death of a Salesman," she is assaulted in their new home, which leaves him determined to find the perpetrator over his wife's traumatized objections.

Title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
Description: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddy.

Title: Thomas and the Magic Railroad

Title: 90 Minutes in Heaven

Title: Les triplettes de Belleville
Description: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

Title: Fatima
Description: Three young shepherds in Fátima, Portugal report visions of the Virgin Mary, inspiring believers and angering officials of the Church and the government, who try to force them to recant their story. Based on historical events.

Title: Oliver Twist

Title: Beasts of the Southern Wild

Title: Alexis Zorbas
Description: An uptight English writer travelling to Crete, on a matter of business, finds his life changed forever when he meets the gregarious Alexis Zorba.

Title: Martin Eden
Description: Martin Eden struggles to rise above his destitute, proletarian circumstances through an intense and passionate pursuit of self-education, hoping to achieve a place among the literary elite.

Title: How I Live Now
Description: An American girl, sent to the English countryside to stay with relatives, finds love and purpose while fighting for her survival as war envelops the world around her.

Title: Bacurau
Description: After the death of her grandmother, Teresa comes home to her matriarchal village in a near-future Brazil to find a succession of sinister events that mobilizes all of its residents.

Title: Peaceful Warrior
Description: A chance encounter with a stranger changes the life of a college gymnast.

Title: Xi you: Xiang mo pian
Description: Tang Sanzang, an aspiring Buddhist hero tries to protect a village from three demons. He develops complex feelings for Miss Duan, the demon hunter who repeatedly helps him, and finally quests to meet the legendary Monkey King.

Title: Trouble Every Day
Description: Two American newlyweds in Paris experience a love so strong, it almost devours them.

Title: Der siebente Kontinent
Description: A European family who plan on escaping to Australia seem caught up in their daily routine, only troubled by minor incidents. However, behind their apparent calm and repetitive existence, they are actually planning something sinister.

Title: The Four Feathers
Description: A young British officer resigns his commission just before his regiment is sent to battle and soon receives four white feathers from his friends and fiancee as symbols of what they view as his cowardice.

Title: The Dream Team
Description: Four mental patients on a field trip in New York City must save their caring chaperon, who ends up being taken to a hospital in a coma after accidentally witnessing a murder, before the killers can find him and finish the job.

Title: Sin nombre
Description: A young Honduran girl and a Mexican gangster are united in a journey across the American border.

Title: Brief Encounter
Description: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

Title: Needful Things
Description: A mysterious new shop opens in a small town which always seems to stock the deepest desires of each shopper, with a price far heavier than expected.

Title: Suburra
Description: A gangster known as "Samurai" wants to turn the waterfront of Rome into a new Las Vegas. All the local mob bosses have agreed to work for this common goal. But peace is not to last long.

Title: Les rivières pourpres
Description: A murder detective must follow the footsteps of a brutal killer within the secrets of a classist college.

Title: Cowboy Bebop: Tengoku no tobira
Description: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up to the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

Title: Upstream Color
Description: A man and woman are drawn together, entangled in the life cycle of an ageless organism. Identity becomes an illusion as they struggle to assemble the loose fragments of wrecked lives.

Title: Suicide Kings
Description: A group of youngsters kidnap a respected Mafia figure.

Title: Suffragette
Description: In 1912 London, a young working mother is galvanized into radical political activism supporting the right for women to vote, and is willing to meet violence with violence to achieve this end.

Title: Narc
Description: When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.

Title: Monsoon Wedding
Description: A stressed father, a bride-to-be with a secret, a smitten event planner, and relatives from around the world create much ado about the preparations for an arranged marriage in India.

Title: Woodstock
Description: Oscar-winning musical chronicle that brilliantly captures the three-day rock concert and celebration of peace and love that became a capstone for the Sixties.

Title: The Broken Hearts Gallery
Description: After a break-up, a young woman decides to start a gallery where people can leave trinkets from past relationships.

Title: Sex Doll
Description: Set in London's world of high class call girls, Amoureux Solitaires tells the story of London based French escort Virgiinie, and Rupert, a man who rescues trafficked girls - A tale of modern love.

Title: Communion
Description: In 1961, a divorced Catholic couple's life is turned upside-down when one of their two adolescent daughters is suspected of her younger sister's brutal murder during her First Holy Communion and a series of subsequent stabbings.

Title: We Are What We Are
Description: The Parkers, a reclusive family who follow ancient customs, find their secret existence threatened as a torrential downpour moves into their area, forcing daughters Iris and Rose to assume responsibilities beyond those of a typical family.

Title: Cold Creek Manor
Description: A family relocates from the city to a dilapidated house in the country that was once a grand estate. As they begin renovations, they discover their new home harbors a secret and may not be completely free of its former inhabitant.

Title: Goodbye Christopher Robin
Description: The relationship between writer AA Milne and his son, Christopher Robin, and how this became the inspiration for Winnie the Pooh.

Title: Split Second
Description: In a flooded future London, Detective Harley Stone hunts a serial killer who murdered his partner, and has haunted him ever since. He soon discovers what he is hunting might not be human.

Title: Edge of Seventeen
Description: A teenager copes with his sexuality on the last day of school in 1984. It shows him coping with being gay and being with friends.

Title: Chaos
Description: Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.

Title: New York, I Love You
Description: Eleven love stories set in one of the most loved and hated cities of the world, New York City.

Title: Foul Play
Description: A shy San Francisco librarian and a bumbling cop fall in love as they solve a crime involving albinos, dwarves, and the Catholic Church.

Title: Two Hands
Description: A 19 year old finds himself in debt to a local gangster when some gang loot disappears and sets him on the run from thugs. Meanwhile two street kids start a shopping spree when they find the missing money.

Title: Happy Birthday to Me
Description: At the snobby Crawford Academy, Virginia's group of friends start to go missing years after horrible events that happened to her as a child around her birthday.

Title: 45 Years
Description: A married couple preparing to celebrate their wedding anniversary receives shattering news that promises to forever change the course of their lives.

Title: City by the Sea
Description: Vincent Lamarca, whose father was executed for a 1950s kidnapping of a child, grew up to become a police officer, only to see his own son become a murder suspect.

Title: The Salton Sea
Description: After a tragic incident, a man drifts into a world populated by thugs and speed junkies.

Title: Open Water 2: Adrift
Description: When a group of friends fail to lower the ladder of their boat, they find themselves stranded in the surrounding waters and struggle to survive.

Title: Untamed Heart
Description: A waitress hardly notices a shy busboy who secretly loves her; until one night she's attacked and he comes to her rescue. From there a relationship sparks but one secret could mean disaster for these fated lovers.

Title: Palmetto
Description: A recently released ex-con gets involved in a fake kidnapping scheme that turns very real.

Title: Tuntematon sotilas
Description: A film adaptation of Väinö Linna's best selling novel The Unknown Soldier (1954) and the novel's unedited manuscript version, Sotaromaani.

Title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
Description: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

Title: Flesh and Bone
Description: Decades later, a son of a killer falls in love with a girl, whose family's horrifying murder he saw in childhood.

Title: An Inconvenient Truth
Description: Filmmaker Davis Guggenheim follows Al Gore on the lecture circuit, as the former presidential candidate campaigns to raise public awareness of the dangers of global warming and calls for immediate action to curb its destructive effects on the environment.

Title: Mon roi
Description: Tony is admitted to a rehabilitation center after a serious skiing accident. Dependent on medical staff and painkillers, she takes the time to remember the tumultuous love story she lived with Georgio.

Title: La meglio gioventù
Description: An Italian epic that follows the lives of two brothers from the 1960s to the 2000s.

Title: Volunteers
Description: 1962, after Yale graduation, womanizing Lawrence flees a gambling debt that his rich dad won't pay. He takes his roomie's place as Peace Corps Volunteer in Thai Golden Triangle with 2 other PCVs. Will he survive 2 years?

Title: The Apple
Description: In 1994, a young couple enters the world of the music industry, and subsequently the world of drugs.

Title: Adams æbler
Description: A neo-Nazi sentenced to community service at a church clashes with the blindly devoted minister.

Title: 88 Minutes
Description: On the day that a serial killer that he helped put away is supposed to be executed, a noted forensic psychologist and college professor receives a call informing him that he has 88 minutes left to live.

Title: The Song of Names
Description: Several years after his childhood friend, a violin prodigy, disappears on the eve of his first solo concert, an Englishman travels throughout Europe to find him.

Title: Force of Nature
Description: A gang of thieves plan a heist during a hurricane and encounter trouble when a cop tries to force everyone in the building to evacuate.

Title: Breach
Description: FBI upstart Eric O'Neill enters into a power game with his boss, Robert Hanssen, an agent who was put on trial for selling secrets to the Soviet Union.

Title: Sunshine
Description: The fate of a Hungarian Jewish family throughout the 20th century.

Title: I'm Your Woman
Description: In this 1970s set crime drama, a woman is forced to go on the run after her husband betrays his partners, sending her and her baby on a dangerous journey.

Title: Scandal
Description: Based on the Profumo Scandal of 1963, an affair between an exotic dancer and the Minister of War shakes up the British government.

Title: Factory Girl
Description: Based on the rise and fall of socialite Edie Sedgwick, concentrating on her relationships with Andy Warhol and a folk singer.

Title: Never Grow Old
Description: An Irish undertaker profits when outlaws take over a peaceful American frontier town, but his family comes under threat as the death toll rises.

Title: Super 30
Description: Based on the life of Patna-based mathematician Anand Kumar who runs the famed Super 30 program for IIT aspirants in Patna.

Title: Monsters of Man
Description: A US weapons manufacturer tests its 4 killer robots on heroin producers in the Golden Triangle in SEAsia. It goes haywire.

Title: Shocker
Description: After being sent to the electric chair, a serial killer uses electricity to come back from the dead and carry out his vengeance on the football player who turned him in to the police.

Title: High Anxiety
Description: A psychiatrist with intense acrophobia (fear of heights) goes to work for a mental institution run by doctors who appear to be crazier than their patients, and have secrets that they are willing to commit murder to keep.

Title: Domestic Disturbance
Description: When Danny witnesses his stepfather Rick murder a man, Danny's father Frank has to protect his son from the greatest danger.

Title: Suspect Zero
Description: A mysterious serial killer is hunting other serial killers, and one F.B.I. Agent suspects there may be more to the vigilante than they imagine.

Title: Six Minutes to Midnight
Description: UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear from a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job six days later, secretly trying to find out what happened.

Title: Proof
Description: The daughter of a brilliant but mentally disturbed mathematician, recently deceased, tries to come to grips with her possible inheritance: his insanity. Complicating matters are one of her father's ex-students, who wants to search through his papers, and her estranged sister, who shows up to help settle his affairs.

Title: Better Luck Tomorrow
Description: A group of over-achieving East Asian American high school seniors enjoy a power trip when they dip into extracurricular criminal activities.

Title: America's Sweethearts
Description: A movie publicist deals with the messy public split of his movie's co-stars while keeping reporters at bay while a reclusive director holds the film's print hostage.

Title: Boxcar Bertha
Description: During the Great Depression, a union leader and a young woman become criminals to exact revenge on the management of a railroad.

Title: The Biggest Little Farm
Description: Documentarian John Chester and his wife Molly work to develop a sustainable farm on 200 acres outside of Los Angeles.

Title: Ascenseur pour l'échafaud
Description: A self-assured businessman murders his employer, the husband of his mistress, which unintentionally provokes an ill-fated chain of events.

Title: The Army of Shadows
Description: An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

Title: Pat Garrett & Billy the Kid
Description: Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

Title: King Creole
Description: A troubled youth's singing sets New Orleans rockin'. With a sweet girl to love him and nightclubbers cheering, it seems he will shake off his past and head for the top. But will a mobster and his man-trap moll snare him in a life of crime?

Title: Kumonosu-jô
Description: A war-hardened general, egged on by his ambitious wife, works to fulfill a prophecy that he would become lord of Spider's Web Castle.

Title: Renaissance Man
Description: A failed businessman is hired by the army to teach a group of underachieving recruits in order to help them pass basic training.

Title: Beloved
Description: Based on the book by Toni Morrison, in which a slave is visited by the spirit of a mysterious young woman

Title: FairyTale: A True Story
Description: In 1917, two children take a photograph, which is soon believed by some to be the first scientific evidence of the existence of fairies.

Title: The Road to Wellville
Description: A story about the ins and outs of one unusual health facility in the early twentieth century, run by the eccentric Dr. John Harvey Kellogg.

Title: Hesher
Description: A young boy has lost his mother and is losing touch with his father and the world around him. Then he meets Hesher who manages to make his life even more chaotic.

Title: Out of Death
Description: A corrupt Sheriff's department in a rural mountain town comes undone when an unintended witness throws a wrench into their shady operation.

Title: The Portrait of a Lady
Description: An American girl inherits a fortune and falls into a misguided relationship with a gentleman confidence artist whose true nature, including a barbed and covetous disposition, turns her life into a nightmare.

Title: Hoshi o ou kodomo
Description: A coming of age story involving young love and a mysterious music, coming from a crystal radio left as a memento by an absent father, that leads a young heroine deep into a hidden world.

Title: Solarbabies
Description: In a post-apocalyptic future ruled by the military, a group of renegade teenage orphans find a legendary orb, Bohdai, that can supposedly bring the rain back to dried up Earth.

Title: Ivanovo detstvo
Description: During WWII, Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev strikes up a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers while working as a scout behind the German lines.

Title: Diqiu zuihou de yewan
Description: A man went back to Guizhou, found the tracks of a mysterious woman. He recalls the summer he spent with her twenty years ago.

Title: How to Marry a Millionaire
Description: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

Title: Vampire in Brooklyn
Description: A ship docks in Brooklyn with all its crew dead, but someone gets off and the killing continues on land. A Caribbean vampire is searching for a specific woman, half-human half-vampire. Rita is the detective investigating the many killings.

Title: Slow West
Description: A young Scottish man travels across America in pursuit of the woman he loves, attracting the attention of an outlaw who is willing to serve as a guide.

Title: The Last Days of Disco
Description: Story of two female Manhattan book editors fresh out of college, both finding love and themselves while frequenting the local disco.

Title: Promised Land
Description: A salesman for a natural gas company experiences life-changing events after arriving in a small town, where his corporation wants to tap into the available resources.

Title: Riri Shushu no subete
Description: The problematic lives of teenager students for whom the singer Lily Chou-Chou's dreamy music is the only way to escape an alienating, violent and insensitive society.

Title: A feleségem története
Description: Jacob Störr, a sea captain, makes a bet in a café with a friend, to marry the first woman who enters the place. And in walks Lizzy.

Title: Amazing Grace
Description: The idealist William Wilberforce (Ioan Gruffudd) maneuvers his way through Parliament, endeavoring to end the British transatlantic slave trade.

Title: The Upside of Anger
Description: When her husband unexpectedly disappears, a sharp-witted suburban wife and her daughters juggle their mom's romantic dilemmas and family dynamics.

Title: Grizzly
Description: An eighteen-foot-tall grizzly bear terrorizes a state park, leaving it up to a Park Ranger to save the day.

Title: 4 mosche di velluto grigio
Description: A musician is stalked by an unknown homicidal maniac, who blackmails him for the accidental killing of another stalker.

Title: Flawless
Description: An ultraconservative security guard suffers a debilitating stroke and is assigned to a rehabilitative program that includes singing lessons with the drag queen next door.

Title: Dogman
Description: A timid dog groomer living in a poor suburb sells cocaine on the side and stays out of trouble, while trying to deal with his unstable, violent acquaintance who is a menace to the whole neighborhood.

Title: The Tragedy of Macbeth
Description: A ruthlessly ambitious Scottish lord seizes the throne with the help of his scheming wife and a trio of witches.

Title: Irma la Douce
Description: When a policeman falls in love with a prostitute, he doesn't want her seeing other men and creates an alter ego who's to be her only customer.

Title: Open 24 Hours
Description: After setting her serial killer boyfriend on fire, a paranoid delusional woman gets a job at an all-night gas station.

Title: Powder Blue
Description: Four Los Angelenos, a mortician, an ex-con, a suicidal ex-priest, and a stripper, are brought together on Christmas Eve by a mixture of circumstances.

Title: BMX Bandits
Description: A trio of teen BMX enthusiasts become entangled with a group of bank robbers after discovering their cache of walkie-talkies.

Title: Middle Men
Description: Chronicles Jack Harris, one of the pioneers of Internet commerce, as he wrestles with his morals and struggles not to drown in a sea of con men, mobsters, drug addicts, and porn stars.

Title: The Journey of Natty Gann
Description: In the 1930s, a tomboy runs away from her guardian to join her single father who is 2,000 miles away, where he has found work.

Title: French Exit
Description: An aging Manhattan socialite existing on the last of her inheritance moves to a small Paris apartment with her son and cat.

Title: The Guardian
Description: A young couple with a newborn baby don't realize that the nanny they hired is a magical nymph who sacrifices infants to an evil tree.

Title: The Champ
Description: Billy Flynn is an ex-champion boxer who was KO'd by booze and gambling. When the wealthy, estranged mother of his young son begins trying to lure the boy away from him, Flynn must return to the ring to provide for his child.

Title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
Description: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

Title: Bright Star
Description: The three-year romance between 19th-century poet John Keats and Fanny Brawne near the end of his life.

Title: Love in the Time of Cholera
Description: Florentino, rejected by the beautiful Fermina at a young age, devotes much of his adult life to carnal affairs as a desperate attempt to heal his broken heart.

Title: Délicieux
Description: France, 1789, just before the Revolution. With the help of a surprising young woman, a chef who has been sacked by his noble master finds the strength to free himself from his position as a servant and opens the first ever restaurant.

Title: Da hong denglong gaogao gua
Description: A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.

Title: Hideaway
Description: Hatch gets a special resuscitative medicine after "dying" in a car accident. His wife and daughter only get minor injuries. He gets strange nightmares such as killing a teen girl. Is it just dreams?

Title: The Frisco Kid
Description: A Polish rabbi wanders through the Old West on his way to lead a synagogue in San Francisco. On the way, he is nearly burned at the stake by Native Americans and almost killed by outlaws.

Title: Ned Kelly
Description: An innocent man becomes one of the most wanted criminals the world has ever known.

Title: Zatôichi
Description: The blind masseur/swordsman comes to a town in control of warring gangs, and while bunking with a farming family, he meets two women with their own agenda.

Title: The Dangerous Lives of Altar Boys
Description: A group of Catholic school friends, after being caught drawing an obscene comic book, plan a heist that will outdo their previous prank and make them local legends.

Title: Infamous
Description: While researching his novel "In Cold Blood", Truman Capote develops a close relationship with convicted murderers Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.

Title: Ratcatcher
Description: A naïve young lad navigates the dirty squalid streets of 1973 Glasgow and the poor youth around him.

Title: I Confess
Description: A priest, who comes under suspicion for murder, cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.

Title: Their Finest
Description: A former secretary, newly appointed as a scriptwriter for propaganda films, joins the cast and crew of a major production while the Blitz rages around them.

Title: 5 to 7
Description: An aspiring novelist enters into a relationship with a woman, though there's just one catch: She's married and the couple can only meet between the hours of 5 and 7 each evening.

Title: The Hero
Description: An ailing movie star comes to terms with his past and mortality.

Title: Dellamorte dellamore
Description: A cemetery man must kill the dead a second time when they become zombies.

Title: Gouttes d'eau sur pierres brûlantes
Description: In 1970s Germany, a 50-year-old businessman falls in love with a 20-year-old man.

Title: Pride and Glory
Description: A family's moral codes are tested when Ray Tierney investigates a case that reveals an incendiary police corruption scandal involving his own brother-in-law. For Ray, the truth is revelatory, a Pandora's Box that threatens to upend not only the Tierney legacy but the entire NYPD.

Title: Luther
Description: During the early sixteenth century, idealistic German monk Martin Luther, disgusted by the materialism in the Catholic Church, begins the dialogue that will lead to the Protestant Reformation.

Title: Gemma Bovery
Description: After moving to the French countryside with her husband, the British beauty, Gemma Bovery, draws the attention of a local baker, who finds in the moving couple a resemblance to the heroes of Madame Bovary

Title: The Interpreter
Description: Political intrigue and deception unfold inside the United Nations, where a U.S. Secret Service agent is assigned to investigate an interpreter who overhears an assassination plot.

Title: The Sleeping Dictionary
Description: A young Englishman is sent to Malaysian Borneo in the 1930s to stay with a tribe as UK's colonial representative. A local woman (J.Alba) helps him understand local tradition and language. He falls in love with her etc. despite the taboo.

Title: The Boy
Description: An intimate portrait of a 9-year-old sociopath's growing fascination with death.

Title: Rawhead Rex
Description: An ancient creature called Rawhead is awakened from its slumber near an Irish village and goes on a rampage killing anyone in sight.

Title: Crying Freeman
Description: A woman sees an assassin outside San Francisco killing yakuza men and later in Vancouver. She's been told that he leaves no witness. Will she be his next victim or...?

Title: Jennifer Eight
Description: John Berlin, a former Los Angeles homicide detective, investigates a multiple murder case in San Diego. The only witness is a blind girl to whom he is immediately attracted.

Title: Inrang
Description: Set in the distant future where both North and South Koreas agree to establish a joint government, which has been in preparation for a duration of 7 years, the plot focuses on political ...                See full summary »

Title: Tomboy
Description: A family moves into a new neighborhood, and a 10-year-old named Laure deliberately presents as a boy named Mikhael to the neighborhood children.

Title: All My Life
Description: A couple's wedding plans are thrown off course when the groom is diagnosed with liver cancer.

Title: King Kong Lives
Description: Kong falls from the twin towers and he appears to be alive. However, his heart is failing, so it's replaced with an artificial one. All is well until he senses that there's a female Kong somewhere out there and escapes wreaking havoc.

Title: Hard Rain
Description: The partner and nephew of an armored-truck driver tries to prevent three million dollars from being taken by a gang during a catastrophic flooding caused by a severe storm.

Title: Fantasia 2000
Description: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

Title: The End of the Affair
Description: A desperate man tries to find out why his beloved left him years ago.

Title: Birthday Girl
Description: A thirtysomething bank clerk from St Albans has his small-town life exploded by the arrival of his Russian mail-order bride.

Title: The Sea Shall Not Have Them
Description: In the North Sea in 1944, passengers of a downed Royal Air Force transport aircraft talk about their lives while awaiting rescue in their dinghy.

Title: Revanche
Description: Ex-con Alex plans to flee to the South with his girl after a robbery. But something terrible happens and revenge seems inevitable.

Title: Boze Cialo
Description: Daniel experiences a spiritual transformation in a detention center. Although his criminal record prevents him from applying to the seminary, he has no intention of giving up his dream and decides to minister a small-town parish.

Title: Annapolis
Description: Set against the backdrop of boxing at the Naval Academy, centers on a young man from the wrong side of the tracks whose dream of attending Annapolis becomes a reality.

Title: Latter Days
Description: A promiscuous gay party animal falls for a young Mormon missionary, leading to crisis, cliché, and catastrophe.

Title: Rampart
Description: Set in 1999 Los Angeles, veteran police officer Dave Brown, the last of the renegade cops, works to take care of his family, and struggles for his own survival.

Title: The Little Stranger
Description: After a doctor is called to visit a crumbling manor, strange things begin to occur.

Title: House of the Long Shadows
Description: An American author finds a dilapidated Welsh manor perfect for writing until the residents host a bizarre family reunion.

Title: Baby Doll
Description: An immature child bride holds her anxious husband at bay while flirting with an amorous Sicilian farmer.

Title: Death and the Maiden
Description: A political activist is convinced that her guest is a man who once tortured her for the government.

Title: I Was a Male War Bride
Description: After marrying an American lieutenant with whom he was assigned to work in post-war Germany, a French captain attempts to find a way to accompany her back to the States under the terms of the War Bride Act.

Title: Mysterious Island
Description: During the Civil War a group of Union soldiers and two Confederates escape the stockade using a hot-air balloon and end up on a strange Pacific island.

Title: Lucifer
Description: A political Godfather dies and a lot of thieves dressed up as politicians took over the rule. Question arises regarding the successor of the God, unfolding few names, along with the God's most beloved angel, Lucifer.

Title: Rang De Basanti
Description: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

Title: Man on Wire
Description: A look at tightrope walker Philippe Petit's daring, but illegal, high-wire routine performed between New York City's World Trade Center's twin towers in 1974, what some consider, "the artistic crime of the century".

Title: Jag är nyfiken - En film i gult
Description: Told in a quasi-documentary style, this companion piece to Jag är nyfiken - En film i blått (1968) deals with topics such as class society, non-violent resistance, sex, relationships, and tourism to Francoist Spain.

Title: Clifford
Description: A bratty 10-year-old boy is obsessed with visiting a dinosaur-themed amusement park. His uptight uncle takes the wily tyke in for a week, and barely lives to regret it.

Title: Salmon Fishing in the Yemen
Description: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

Title: A Journal for Jordan
Description: 1st Sgt. Charles Monroe King, before he is killed in action in Baghdad, authors a journal for his son intended to tell him how to live a decent life despite growing up without a father.

Title: Evangelion Shin Gekijôban: Jo
Description: The fate of the world is threatened by seemingly monstrous entities known as Angels. NERV is an organisation set up to counter this threat and it is up to young pilots to protect Earth but exactly what are the real motives behind NERV?

Title: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Them
Description: One couple's story as they try to reclaim the life and love they once knew and pick up the pieces of a past that may be too far gone.

Title: The Hunter's Prayer
Description: An assassin helps a young woman avenge the death of her family.

Title: El guardián invisible
Description: A female inspector confronts a serial killer while dealing with the ghosts of her past.

Title: The Quiet Earth
Description: A man named Zac Hobson awakens to find himself alone in the world. In a desperate attempt to search for others, he finds only two who have their own agenda.

Title: [Rec]³: Génesis
Description: A couple's wedding day turns horrific as some of the guests start showing signs of a strange illness.

Title: If Only
Description: It takes a tragedy to teach the young businessman Ian to put love ahead of work and open up to his musician girlfriend Samantha.

Title: The Theory of Flight
Description: Two miserable people find happiness together: a man dreaming of flying, and a woman dreaming of living.

Title: Liteul poleseuteu
Description: A young woman grows tired of life in the city and returns to her hometown in the countryside.

Title: Le violon rouge
Description: A red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

Title: The Silencers
Description: Retired agent Matt Helm is re-activated in order to stop an evil organization from exploding an atom bomb over the USA and starting WWIII.

Title: Bird on a Wire
Description: An old flame discovers her ex-boyfriend from the past is a relocated FBI informant out to stop the bad guys.

Title: Wildcats
Description: A rookie high school football coach has a harder time than she expected trying to whip her tough inner city team into shape.

Title: Little Ashes
Description: About the young life and loves of artist Salvador Dalí, filmmaker Luis Buñuel and writer Federico García Lorca.

Title: Swing Shift
Description: A woman finds romance when she takes a job at an aircraft plant to help make ends meet after her husband goes off to war.

Title: A United Kingdom
Description: The story of King Seretse Khama of Botswana and how his loving but controversial marriage to a British white woman, Ruth Williams, put his kingdom into political and diplomatic turmoil.

Title: Onibaba
Description: Two women kill samurai and sell their belongings for a living. While one of them is having an affair with their neighbor, the other woman meets a mysterious samurai wearing a bizarre mask.

Title: The Shipping News
Description: An emotionally beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.

Title: Snow White: A Tale of Terror
Description: In this dark take on the fairy tale, the growing hatred of a noblewoman, secretly a practitioner of the dark arts, for her stepdaughter, and the witch's horrifying attempts to kill her.

Title: La isla mínima
Description: Two cops lost in the deep south of Spain. One serial killer to catch. A lot of secrets and lies to disclose.

Title: Monte Walsh
