Description: Upset that he has to share the room he loves with his grandfather, Peter decides to declare war in an attempt to get it back.

Title: Donnie Brasco
Description: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

Title: Lethal Weapon
Description: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

Title: Replicas
Description: A scientist becomes obsessed with bringing back his family members who died in a traffic accident.

Title: The Color Purple
Description: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

Title: Babe
Description: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs on a rural English farm, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

Title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
Description: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

Title: Ghostbusters II
Description: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

Title: Un beau matin
Description: With a father suffering from neurodegenerative disease, a young woman lives with her eight-year-old daughter. While struggling to secure a decent nursing home, she runs into an unavailable friend with whom she embarks on an affair.

Title: The Goldfinch
Description: A boy in New York is taken in by a wealthy family after his mother is killed in a bombing at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. In a rush of panic, he steals 'The Goldfinch', a painting that eventually draws him into a world of crime.

Title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
Description: After being mistaken for an actor, a New York thief is sent to Hollywood to train under a private eye for a potential movie role, but the duo are thrown together with a struggling actress into a murder mystery.

Title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
Description: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

Title: I'm Not Ashamed
Description: The true story of Rachel Joy Scott, the first student killed in the Columbine High School shooting on April 20, 1999.

Title: Ronin
Description: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

Title: Maid in Manhattan
Description: A Senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite, when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.

Title: Roma
Description: A year in the life of a middle-class family's maid in Mexico City in the early 1970s.

Title: Jersey Girl
Description: A widower must look after his precocious daughter and rebuild his life and career after he's sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup.

Title: Spirited
Description: A musical version of Charles Dickens's story of a miserly misanthrope who is taken on a magical journey.

Title: Radio
Description: The story of a high school coach and the developmentally challenged man who he took under his wing.

Title: Mr. Harrigan's Phone
Description: When Mr. Harrigan dies, Craig, the teen who befriended and did odd jobs for him, puts his smart phone in his pocket before burial. When the lonely youth sends his dead friend a message, he is shocked to get a return text.

Title: Miracle
Description: The true story of Herb Brooks, the player-turned-coach who led the 1980 U.S. Olympic hockey team to victory over the seemingly invincible Soviet squad.

Title: To Live and Die in L.A.
Description: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.

Title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
Description: A prince of the mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth. Hellboy and his team must fight to stop him from locating the all-powerful Golden Army.

Title: The Poseidon Adventure
Description: Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

Title: The Last Picture Show
Description: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

Title: Rang zong
Description: A horrifying story of a shaman's inheritance in the Isan region of Thailand. What could be possessing a family member might not be the Goddess they make it out to be.

Title: Mommie Dearest
Description: The abusive and traumatic adoptive upbringing of Christina Crawford at the hands of her mother, screen queen Joan Crawford, is depicted.

Title: Mermaids
Description: An unconventional single mother relocates with her two daughters to a small Massachusetts town in 1963, where a number of events and relationships both challenge and strengthen their familial bonds.

Title: Notes on a Scandal
Description: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her fifteen-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond a platonic friendship.

Title: All the Money in the World
Description: The story of the kidnapping of 16-year-old John Paul Getty III and the desperate attempt by his devoted mother to convince his billionaire grandfather Jean Paul Getty to pay the ransom.

Title: The Nun's Story
Description: After leaving a wealthy Belgian family to become a nun, Sister Luke struggles with her devotion to her vows during crisis, disappointment, and World War II.

Title: Class
Description: A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, but soon realizes the woman he hooked up with is not who he expected.

Title: Why Him?
Description: A holiday gathering threatens to go off the rails when Ned Fleming realizes that his daughter's Silicon Valley millionaire boyfriend is about to pop the question.

Title: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
Description: The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken control of a New York City media mogul's high-tech skyscraper.

Title: Spy Game
Description: Retiring CIA agent Nathan Muir recalls his training of Tom Bishop while working against agency politics to free him from his Chinese captors.

Title: L'immensità
Description: The story of love between Clara and her children, set in Rome in the '70s.

Title: Still Alice
Description: A linguistics professor and her family find their bonds tested when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease.

Title: The Family Man
Description: A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife.

Title: Daylight
Description: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

Title: Filth
Description: A corrupt, junkie cop with bipolar disorder attempts to manipulate his way through a promotion in order to win back his wife and daughter while also fighting his own inner demons.

Title: Ocean's Eleven
Description: Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist. Together the eleven friends plan to rob five Las Vegas casinos in one night.

Title: The Electrical Life of Louis Wain
Description: English artist Louis Wain rises to prominence at the end of the 19th century for his surreal cat paintings that seemed to reflect his declining sanity.

Title: The Inspection
Description: A young, gay Black man, rejected by his mother and with few options for his future, decides to join the Marines, doing whatever it takes to succeed in a system that would cast him aside.

Title: Sisters
Description: Two sisters decide to throw one last house party before their parents sell their family home.

Title: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil
Description: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

Title: Driving Miss Daisy
Description: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

Title: Kill the Irishman
Description: The true story of Danny Greene, a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970's.

Title: The Man Who Fell to Earth
Description: An alien must pose as a human to save his dying planet, but a woman and greed of other men create complications.

Title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
Description: The world-famous singing preteen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

Title: The American President
Description: A widowed U.S. President running for reelection and an environmental lobbyist fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception," and sparks fly anyway.

Title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
Description: When a shopping mall is taken over by a gang of organized crooks, it's up to a mild-mannered security guard to save the day.

Title: The Lion in Winter
Description: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. When he allows his imprisoned wife Eleanor of Aquitaine out for a Christmas visit, they all variously plot to force him into a decision.

Title: Firebird
Description: Firebird follows a handsome, soulful young soldier who embarks on a clandestine sexual affair with a charismatic fighter pilot on a Soviet Air Force Base at the height of 1970's Communist rule.

Title: Jack and Jill
Description: Family guy, Jack Sadelstein, prepares for the annual event he always dreads--the Thanksgiving visit of his fraternal twin sister, the needy, and passive-aggressive Jill, who then refuses to leave.

Title: Holidate
Description: Fed up with being single on holidays, two strangers agree to be each other's platonic plus-ones all year long, only to catch real feelings along the way.
Hysterical Californians prepare for a Japanese invasion in the days after Pearl Harbor.

Title: Daddy's Home
Description: Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.

Title: Night Shift
Description: A mild-mannered morgue attendant is assigned to the night shift, and his new coworker, along with his prostitute neighbor, convince him of running a prostitution ring out of the morgue.

Title: High Crimes
Description: A successful lawyer's husband is arrested for murdering 9 villagers in El Salvador in 1988 as US soldier under a different name. She defends him in military court and investigates. Framed?

Title: Sydney
Description: Professional gambler Sydney teaches John the tricks of the trade. John does well until he falls for cocktail waitress Clementine.

Title: Shadowlands
Description: C.S. Lewis, a world-renowned Christian theologian, writer and professor, leads a passionless life until he meets spirited poet Joy Gresham from the U.S.

Title: The Boss Baby: Family Business
Description: The Templeton brothers have become adults and drifted away from each other, but a new boss baby with a cutting-edge approach is about to bring them together again - and inspire a new family business.

Title: The Meaning of Life
Description: The comedy team takes a look at life in all of its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

Title: Tommy
Description: A psychosomatically blind, deaf, and mute boy becomes a master pinball player and, subsequently, the figurehead of a cult.

Title: Staying Alive
Description: Five years later, Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenge yet: succeeding as a dancer on the Broadway stage.

Title: Love Hard
Description: An LA girl, unlucky in love, falls for an East Coast guy on a dating app and decides to surprise him for the holidays, only to discover that she's been catfished. This lighthearted romantic comedy chronicles her attempt to reel in love.

Title: Man on the Moon
Description: The life and career of legendary comedian Andy Kaufman.

Title: The Boat That Rocked
Description: A band of rogue DJs that captivated Britain, playing the music that defined a generation and standing up to a government that wanted classical music, and nothing else, on the airwaves.

Title: First Daughter
Description: The daughter of the U.S. President heads off to college where she falls for a graduate student with a secret.

Title: Friend of the Family
Description: A mysterious, but kind-hearted, drifter tries to help a wealthy, but dysfunctional, Malibu family with their personal and romantic problems between them.

Title: Something from Tiffany's
Description: Follows a woman as her life gets upended when an engagement ring that was for someone else leads her to the person she's meant to be with.

Title: The Cutting Edge
Description: A temperamental figure skater and an arrogant former hockey player attempt to win the Olympic Gold Medal as a figure skating pairs team.

Title: Swiss Family Robinson
Description: A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

Title: Toys
Description: When Lieutenant General Leland Zevo (Sir Michael Gambon) inherits a toymaking company and begins making war toys, his employees band together to stop him before he ruins the name of Zevo Toys forever.
The famous 1970s New York City nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

Title: Alex Borstein: Corsets & Clown Suits
Description: Alex Borstein performs a music-infused stand-up special from The Wolford Theatre.

Title: Sid and Nancy
Description: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

Title: The Noel Diary
Description: The story of a man who returns home on Christmas to settle his estranged mother's estate. Once there, he discovers a diary that may hold secrets to his own past and of a beautiful young woman on a mysterious journey of her own.

Title: RoboCop 3
Description: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

Title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
Description: The Chipmunks believe that Dave plans to propose to his new girlfriend in Miami.--and dump them. They have three days to get to him and save themselves not only from losing Dave but also from gaining a terrible stepbrother.

Title: Hounds of Love
Description: Vicki Maloney is randomly abducted from a suburban street by a disturbed couple. As she observes the dynamic between her captors she quickly realises she must drive a wedge between them if she is to survive.

Title: Daddy's Home 2
Description: Having finally gotten used to each other's existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

Title: Bar Fight!
Description: Nina and Allen split everything in their lives after their break-up and must compete in a ridiculous custody battle for their prized watering hole in which lines will be drawn, sides will be chosen, and beers will be drunken.

Title: Anywhere But Here
Description: A mother and daughter search for success in Beverly Hills.

Title: Profondo rosso
Description: A jazz pianist and a wisecracking journalist are pulled into a complex web of mystery after the former witnesses the brutal murder of a psychic.

Title: Mother/Android
Description: In a post-apocalyptic world rocked by a violent android uprising, a young pregnant woman and her boyfriend desperately search for safety.

Title: A Bad Moms Christmas
Description: As their own mothers drop in unexpectedly, our three under-appreciated and over-burdened moms rebel against the challenges and expectations of the Super Bowl for mothers: Christmas.

Title: Looking for Mr. Goodbar
Description: A dedicated schoolteacher spends her nights cruising bars, looking for abusive men with whom she can engage in progressively extreme sexual encounters.

Title: Rabid
Description: A young woman develops a taste for human blood after experimental plastic surgery, and her victims turn into blood-thirsty zombies, leading into a city-wide epidemic.

Title: Spoonful of Sugar
Description: Millicent is taking a semester off from her studies to take care of Johnny, a sickly, mute child with severe allergies. His mother, Rebecca, is an author and his father, Jacob, is a carpenter.

Title: Detective Knight: Redemption
Description: In custody in New York, Detective James Knight finds himself in the middle of a jailbreak led by The Christmas Bomber, a brutal fanatic whose Santa Claus disciples are terrorizing the city....                See full summary »

Title: With Honors
Description: Convinced his thesis will have him graduate with honors from Harvard University, a stuffy student finds himself at the mercy of a homeless man's demands when he holds the papers hostage.

Title: Fanny och Alexander
Description: Two young Swedish children in the 1900s experience the many comedies and tragedies of their lively and affectionate theatrical family, the Ekdahls.

Title: The World's Fastest Indian
Description: The story of New Zealander Burt Munro, who spent years rebuilding a 1920 Indian motorcycle, which helped him set the land speed world record at Utah's Bonneville Salt Flats in 1967.

Title: Good Night, and Good Luck.
Description: Broadcast journalist Edward R. Murrow looks to bring down Senator Joseph McCarthy.

Title: Muzi v nadeji
Description: When a father teaches his son in-law about the perks of cheating, things take unexpected turns...

Title: The Birthday Cake
Description: On the 10th anniversary of his father's death, Giovanni reluctantly accepts the task of bringing a cake to the home of his uncle, a mob boss, for a celebration. Just two hours into the night, Gio's life is forever changed.

Title: Jamesy Boy
Description: A young gang member turns his life around in prison, thanks to the friendship he forms with a convicted murderer who becomes his mentor.

Title: Carrie Pilby
Description: A person of high intelligence struggles to make sense of the world as it relates to morality, relationships, sex, and leaving her apartment.

Title: I Still Believe
Description: The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.

Title: Far from Heaven
Description: In 1950s Connecticut, a flustered housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.

Title: A Love Song for Bobby Long
Description: A headstrong young woman returns to New Orleans after the death of her estranged mother.

Title: Les traducteurs
Description: Nine translators hired to translate the eagerly-awaited final book of a bestselling trilogy are confined in a luxurious bunker. The dream job becomes a nightmare when the first 10 pages of the top-secret manuscript appear online.

Title: Cats & Dogs
Description: A look at the top-secret, high-tech espionage war going on between cats and dogs, of which their human owners are blissfully unaware.

Title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
Description: Two young friends find a magic book that brings a ventriloquist's dummy to life.

Title: Assault on Precinct 13
Description: A police sergeant must rally the cops and prisoners together to protect themselves on New Year's Eve, just as corrupt policeman surround the station with the intent of killing all to keep their deception in the ranks.

Title: Calvaire
Description: Marc, a traveling entertainer, is on his way home for Christmas when his van breaks down in the middle of a jerkwater town with some strange inhabitants.

Title: Los agitadores
Description: A group of young men at a gathering in a luxury villa test each other's boundaries.

Title: Mangiati vivi!
Description: A young woman teams up with a mercenary to find her missing sister in the jungles of New Guinea where they find that a deranged leader of a religious cult has located his commune in an area inhabited by cannibals.

Title: Chasing Liberty
Description: Anna wants to be like other girls her age (18): date a guy etc. but she's the US president's daughter and always guarded. In Prague he breaks his promise of only 2 agents following her to a concert and she runs away with Ben to see Europe.

Title: I Love You Phillip Morris
Description: A cop turns con man once he comes out of the closet. Once imprisoned, he meets the second love of his life, whom he'll stop at nothing to be with.

Title: Scrooged
Description: A selfish, cynical television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

Title: Reds
Description: A radical American journalist becomes involved with the Communist revolution in Russia, and hopes to bring its spirit and idealism to the United States.

Title: Under Suspicion
Description: A wealthy attorney in San Juan comes to the police station for "10 minutes" of follow-up questions to finding a 12-year-old girl's body in a park. Another young girl was also raped and murdered weeks earlier and the evidence points to him.

Title: The Mean One
Description: In a sleepy mountain town, Cindy's parents are murdered and her Christmas is stolen by a bloodthirsty green figure in a red Santa suit.

Title: Dare mo shiranai
Description: In a small Tokyo apartment, twelve-year-old Akira must care for his younger siblings after their mother leaves them and shows no sign of returning.

Title: Jingle All the Way
Description: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

Title: Vox Lux
Description: An unusual set of circumstances brings unexpected success to a pop star.

Title: Jersey Boys
Description: The story of four young men from the wrong side of the tracks in New Jersey who came together to form the iconic 1960s rock group The Four Seasons.

Title: Consenting Adults
Description: During a joint dinner at the restaurant, the neighbors offer to exchange wives for one night. It was a joke, but only at first.

Title: Performance
Description: A violent gangster seeks refuge from the mob in the Bohemian home of a former rock star.

Title: Stone of Destiny
Description: The story of Ian Hamilton, a dedicated nationalist who reignited Scottish national pride in the 1950s with his daring raid on the heart of England to bring the Stone of Scone back to Scotland.

Title: Diner
Description: A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.

Title: What a Way to Go!
Description: A four-time widow discusses her four marriages, in which all of her husbands became incredibly rich and died prematurely because of their drive to be rich.

Title: The Notorious Bettie Page
Description: The life of Bettie Page, a 1950s pin-up model and one of the first sex icons in America, who became the target of a Senate investigation because of her risqué bondage photos.

Title: Michael
Description: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

Title: Stalag 17
Description: After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

Title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
Description: Using a special camera that can see spirits, a family must protect their daughter from an evil entity with a sinister plan.

Title: I Saw the Light
Description: The story of the country-western singer Hank Williams, who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his rise to fame and its tragic effect on his health and personal life.

Title: Short Circuit 2
Description: Robot Johnny Five comes to the city and gets manipulated by criminals who want him for their own purposes.

Title: Holiday Harmony
Description: A likeable and talented underdog gets momentarily sidelined from chasing her musical dreams when her van breaks down in a welcoming small town just before Christmas.

Title: Turbulence
Description: After a shootout on a flight transporting prisoners, a flight attendant must outwit a smooth-talking serial killer and land the plane herself.

Title: Random Hearts
Description: Police Sergeant Dutch Van Den Broek (Harrison Ford) and U.S. Representative Kay Chandler (Dame Kristin Scott Thomas) lose their spouses in a plane crash, and they soon discover that their spouses were having an affair with each other.

Title: Bless the Child
Description: Cody, a little girl abandoned by her mother and raised by her aunt, a nurse, is kidnapped. The girl's guardian, aided by an F.B.I. agent, learn that Cody has supernatural abilities, and the abductees are a Satanic cult willing to do anything to gain them.

Title: Spontaneous
Description: Get ready for the outrageous coming-of-age love story about growing up...and blowing up. When students in their school begin exploding (literally), seniors Mara and Dylan struggle to survive in a world where each moment may be their last.

Title: Smoke
Description: A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.

Title: La casa lobo
Description: Tells the story of Maria, a young woman who takes refuge in a house in southern Chile after escaping from a German colony.

Title: Money Train
Description: A vengeful New York City transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares. His foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

Title: Große Freiheit
Description: In post-war Germany, liberation by the Allies does not mean freedom for everyone. Hans is repeatedly imprisoned under Paragraph 175, which criminalizes homosexuality. Over the decades, he develops an unlikely bond with his cellmate Viktor.

Title: Party Monster
Description: Based on the true story of Michael Alig, a Club Kid party organizer whose life was sent spiraling down when he bragged on television about killing his drug dealer and roommate.

Title: Wake in Fright
Description: After a bad gambling bet, a schoolteacher is marooned in a town full of crazy, drunk, violent men who threaten to make him just as crazy, drunk, and violent.

Title: Luce
Description: A married couple is forced to reckon with their idealized image of their son, adopted from war-torn Eritrea, after an alarming discovery by a devoted high school teacher threatens his status as an all-star student.

Title: Simon Birch
Description: A young boy with stunted growth is convinced that God has a great purpose for him.

Title: Super Dark Times
Description: Teenagers Zach and Josh have been best friends their whole lives, but when a gruesome accident leads to a cover-up, the secret drives a wedge between them and propels them down a rabbit hole of escalating paranoia and violence.

Title: The Queen's Corgi
Description: The British monarch's (Dame Julie Walters') favorite dog gets lost from the palace and finds himself at a dog fight club. He then begins his long journey to find his way back home.

Title: ATM
Description: On a late night visit to an ATM, three co-workers end up in a desperate fight for their lives when they become trapped by an unknown man.

Title: Never So Few
Description: During WW2, the American OSS mounts covert operations with the native Kachin against the Japanese army in the jungles of Burma.

Title: The Magdalene Sisters
Description: Three young Irish women struggle to maintain their spirits while they endure dehumanizing abuse as inmates of a Magdalene Sisters Asylum.

Title: This Is Christmas
Description: Rom-com set in London during the Christmas season, following Adam and Emma on their daily commute from the village of Langton to London, where they meet the same passengers every day.

Title: Christmas Bloody Christmas
Description: It's Christmas Eve and Tori just wants to get drunk and party, but when a robotic Santa Claus at a nearby toy store goes haywire and begins a rampant killing spree through her small town, she's forced into a battle for survival.

Title: Auntie Mame
Description: An orphan goes to live with his free-spirited aunt. Conflict ensues when the executor of his father's estate objects to the aunt's lifestyle.

Title: Christmas with the Campbells
Description: Jess gets dumped by her boyfriend right before Christmas but his parents still want to celebrate Christmas with her while their son is away. Then she meets his cousin, but once he returns, Christmas gets a lot more complicated.

Title: The Hotel New Hampshire
Description: A family weathers all sorts of disasters and keeps going in spite of everything, in a film noted for its wonderful assortment of oddball characters.

Title: El día de la bestia
Description: Bent on committing as many sins as possible to avert the birth of the beast, a Catholic priest teams up with a Black Metal aficionado and an Italian connoisseur of the occult. Now, he must become an unrelenting sinner. Is there still hope?

Title: Dorm Daze
Description: Set during a crazy afternoon in the lives of a dozen college students at a co-ed dorm that starts with the arrival of two very different women with the same name of Dominique.

Title: Deck the Halls
Description: Two neighbors have it out after one of them decorates his house for the holidays so brightly that it can be seen from space.

Title: Friends with Money
Description: After she quits her lucrative job, Olivia finds herself unsure about her future and her relationships with her successful and wealthy friends.

Title: Funny Pages
Description: A bitingly funny coming-of-age story of a teenage cartoonist who rejects the comforts of his suburban life in a misguided quest for soul.

Title: Eight Crazy Nights
Description: Davey Stone, an alcoholic with a criminal record, is sentenced to community service under the supervision of an elderly referee. Davey is then faced with trying to reform and abandon his bad habits.

Title: The Railway Children
Description: After the enforced absence of their father, three children move with their mother to Yorkshire, where during their adventures they attempt to discover the reason for his disappearance.

Title: Female Trouble
Description: A spoiled schoolgirl runs away from home, gets pregnant while hitch-hiking, and ends up as a fashion model for a pair of beauticians who like to photograph women committing crimes.

Title: Life with Mikey
Description: A once-popular actor who now runs a talent agency specializing in child acts is trying to discover the next star. He gets more than he bargained for when he recruits a child pickpocket.

Title: Paradise Alley
Description: Three Italian-American brothers, living in the slums of 1940's New York City, try to help each other with one's wrestling career using one brother's promotional skills and another brother's con-artist tactics to thwart a sleazy manager.

Title: Everybody's Fine
Description: A widower who realized his only connection to his family was through his wife sets off on an impromptu road trip to reunite with each of his grown children.

Title: Christmas in the Wild
Description: Jilted by her husband on the eve of embarking on an African safari, a woman travels to the continent solo and meets an elephant conservationist.

Title: The Best Man Holiday
Description: When college friends reunite after 15 years over the Christmas holidays, they discover just how easy it is for long-forgotten rivalries and romances to be reignited.

Title: Asylum
Description: A woman becomes very curious about one of her psychiatrist husband's inmates, a man who was found guilty in the murder and disfigurement of his former wife.

Title: Duplex
Description: A young couple has a chance to move into a gorgeous duplex in the perfect New York neighborhood. All they have to do is bump off the current tenant, a cute little old lady.

Title: Conviction
Description: A working mother puts herself through law school in an effort to represent her brother, who has been wrongfully convicted of murder and has exhausted his chances to appeal his conviction through public defenders.

Title: Four Christmases
Description: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.

Title: Death of a Ladies' Man
Description: A carousing college professor's life takes a series of unimaginable turns, and all the old stories are given a new twist, when he begins to have surreal hallucinations and learns he may not be long for this world.

Title: Noelle
Description: Santa's daughter must take over the family business when her father retires and her brother, who is supposed to inherit the Santa role, gets cold feet.

Title: You're Not You
Description: A drama centered on a classical pianist who has been diagnosed with ALS and the brash college student who becomes her caregiver.

Title: The Day of the Locust
Description: An art director in the 1930s falls in love and attempts to make a young woman an actress despite Hollywood who wants nothing to do with her because of her problems with an estranged man and her alcoholic father.

Title: Clinical
Description: A psychiatrist tries to put her life back together after a violent attack by seeking to repair the life of a new patient, but he has his own terrifying history.

Title: The Christmas Chronicles
Description: The story of sister and brother, Kate and Teddy Pierce, whose Christmas Eve plan to catch Santa Claus on camera turns into an unexpected journey that most kids could only dream about.

Title: Only the Lonely
Description: A Chicago cop must balance loyalty to his overbearing mother and a relationship with a shy funeral home worker.

Title: Bed of Roses
Description: Romantic drama about a young career girl who is swept off her feet by a shy florist who fell in love with her after one glimpse through a shadowy window.

Title: A Summer Place
Description: A self-made businessman rekindles a romance with a former flame while their two teenage children begin a romance of their own with drastic consequences for both couples.

Title: Metropolitan
Description: A group of young upper-class Manhattanites are blithely passing through the gala debutante season, when an unusual outsider joins them and stirs them up.

Title: Hard Kill
Description: The work of billionaire tech CEO Donovan Chalmers (Willis) is so valuable that he hires mercenaries to protect it, and a terrorist group kidnaps his daughter just to get it.

Title: The Trouble with Angels
Description: Two high-spirited young students at St. Francis Academy keep things hopping for the challenged Mother Superior and her staff of bewildered Sisters.

If you want to take a vacation, keep driving past this place.
